question: 相変わらず
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>mutual</kanji> <kanji>change</kanji> you make with other people will go so smoothly that it will seem like everything is working <vocabulary>as usual</vocabulary>. It will be like everything is <vocabulary>the same</vocabulary> as it was before because the change was mutual.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
